website_summaries.verdict: The LG Chromebase puts the simplicity of the Chromebox into an all-in-one form factor, creating an inexpensive and complete alternative to your standard PC.

If it came with a wireless mouse at the least and was a little sturdier, it would have got full marks.

product_meta.title: LG Chromebase 21.5" All-in-One Chrome Monitor PC - White (Intel Celeron 2955U, 2Gb RAM, 16Gb SSD, LAN, WLAN, BT, Webcam, Integrated Graphics, Google Chrome)
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:WhiteThe LG Chromebase all-in-one computer is based on simple, yet powerful architecture, and comes complete with several outstanding Google applications. It also serves as a gateway to tens of thousands of web apps in the Chrome Web Store, many of which work just as well offline as they do online. The LG Chromebase allows users to write emails and documents, read the latest news and e-books, edit videos and photos and play entertaining games. The streamlined platform makes almost any task effortless and is the perfect device for taking advantage of Google products such as Gmail, Drive, Search, Maps, YouTube, Play or Google+ Hangouts. The LG Chromebase also offers robust built-in security, employing multiple layers of protection to keep users' information safe. Moreover, with automatic built-in updates, Chrome OS reduces the hassle of manually having to conduct time-consuming maintenance.

With excellent hardware and a sleek, minimalistic design, the LG Chromebase reflects the power and simplicity of the Chrome operating system. Ideal for both personal and business use, the versatile computer features a Full HD IPS display that delivers accurate colour reproduction, stunning contrast and an impressive 178 degree viewing angle. A 4th generation Intel processor enables the LG Chromebase to handle web apps, games and graphics with ease. This versatile computer also incorporates a 1.3MP webcam and a microphone for easy video calling. If that's not enough, this stylish, compact all-in-one delivers clear and powerful sound through a pair of built-in 5W speakers.

BOX CONTAINS
LG Chromebase AIO PC
Power Adapter
LG Wired Keyboard
LG Wired Mouse
User Documentation
